name: qr
query:
SELECT 
    q.name AS "Query Name",
    q.raw_material AS "Raw Material",
    q.supplier AS "Supplier",
    q.manufacturer AS "Manufacturer",
    q.query_types AS "Query Types",
    q.workflow_state AS "Status",
    q.creation AS "From",
    q.creation AS "To",
    u.full_name AS "Owner Full Name",
    u.location AS "Client Code"
FROM 
    `tabQuery` q
JOIN 
    `tabUser` u ON q.owner = u.name
WHERE 
    q.workflow_state <> 'Draft'
